item.title: Samples: changing tile size example is broken
item.comments:

ludwigb
commented

At least on dev the changing tile size sample is broken. It seems that the persistent tile cache is getting in the way of properly drawing the screen with the right tiles.
Collaborator
ludwigb
commented
